_header: I love a lover that loveth me well
Subjects: Christ, love of; love, of Christ
_description: James Ryman, A love-song of Christ — five quatrains (abab) and burden: ‘My heart is sette alone / On god bothe thre and one’

CULEe112.First Lines:
I loue a louer that loueth me wellTo alle mankyende which is
                    socoure…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…And on the Crosse did suffre dethTo vs mote be eternall
                    foode
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.
